mapper.select: select distinct a.item_no, b.title, a.price, b.itemboard_date, a.delivery_fee, c.thum_img from item a, itemboard b, itemimg c where a.item_no=b.item_no and b.itemboard_no=c.itemboard_no and b.recommend_ornot=1

select category_title, itemboard_no, sub_title, thum_img, title, price, itemboard_date, delivery_fee, hits, ranking from(select a.category_title, d.itemboard_no, b.sub_title, e.thum_img, d.title, c.price, d.itemboard_date, c.delivery_fee, d.hits, rank() over(partition by a.category_title order by hits desc)as ranking from category a, category_sub b, item c, itemboard d, itemimg e where a.category_no = b.category_no and b.sub_no = d.sub_no and c.item_no = d.item_no and d.itemboard_no = e.itemboard_no group by a.category_title, d.itemboard_no, b.sub_title, e.thum_img, d.title, c.price, d.itemboard_date, c.delivery_fee, d.hits) where ranking <= 10
select category_no, category_title from category order by category_no
select category_no, category_title from category order by category_no
select category_no, sub_no, sub_title from category_sub order by sub_no, category_no

select e.title, d.price, c.fav_no, e.hits, e.itemboard_date, d.item_state, e.change_ornot, d.delivery_fee, e.local, e.itemboard_contents, a.category_title, b.sub_title, e.tag from category a, category_sub b, fav c, item d, itemboard e where a.category_no = b.category_no and b.sub_no = e.sub_no and c.itemboard_no = e.itemboard_no and d.item_no = e.item_no and e.itemboard_no = #{itemboard_no}
